sentences.en: A ferrule and eraser are crimped into place on each pencil.
sentences.cn: 金属环把橡皮头固定到每一根铅笔上.

sentences.en: Donna : She really liked it. So can I borrow your eraser ?
sentences.cn: 她太喜欢它了. 那么,我能借你的 吗 ?

sentences.en: He puts his pen, ruler and eraser into his backpack.
sentences.cn: 他把他的钢笔 、 尺子和橡皮擦装进书包里.

sentences.en: He rubbed out the last sentence on his paper with his eraser.
sentences.cn: 他用橡皮把试卷上的最后一句话擦掉了.

sentences.en: I get annoyed when classmates borrow my eraser and don't return it.
sentences.cn: 当同学们借了我的橡皮不偿还时我变患上很气末路.

sentences.en: I have an eraser.
sentences.cn: 我有一块橡皮。

sentences.en: I want to buy an eraser in that stationery shop.
sentences.cn: 我想去那家文具店买块橡皮.

sentences.en: If you use a liner keep an eraser nearby.
sentences.cn: 如果你使用眼线笔,那就在旁边准备一块橡皮.

sentences.en: In Hayes’ most recent study, he recruited 87 healthy volunteers and examined an area of their tongues about the size of the head of a pencil eraser.
sentences.cn: 在海斯的最新研究中，他招集了87 个健康的志愿者，检查了这些人舌头的一块区域——大约铅笔上的橡皮擦头部大小。

sentences.en: Mechanical Pencil, Refill Leads , Ballpen Wooden Pencil, Eraser, Stationery PlasticPlastic Products.
sentences.cn: 采购产品笔, 充值线索,圆珠笔木制铅笔, 橡皮擦, 文具.

sentences.en: Now the other students open their eyes, and guess who has eraser.
sentences.cn: 现在其他学生睁开眼睛, 猜橡皮擦在谁手中.

sentences.en: Occasionally use the eraser to erase bits that are looking weird.
sentences.cn: 用橡皮擦工具擦去看上去不太好的地方.

sentences.en: Press to bring up the eraser tool, or find it in your Toolbox.
sentences.cn: 按调出橡皮擦工具，或在你的工具栏里找到它。

sentences.en: Press to bring up the eraser tool, orfind it in your Toolbox.
sentences.cn: 按调出橡皮擦工具，或在你的工具栏里找到它。

sentences.en: Rub out chalk marks with an eraser.
sentences.cn: 用黑板擦擦掉粉笔字迹.

sentences.en: That is an eraser.
sentences.cn: 那是一块橡皮擦。

sentences.en: Trust is like an eraser. It gets smaller and smaller after every mistake.
sentences.cn: 信任就像橡皮擦，在一次一次的错误中慢慢损耗变小。

sentences.en: Use the Eraser tool to take out any unwanted lines.
sentences.cn: 使用橡皮擦工具采取任何不想要的线路.

sentences.en: What's the matter with you? I can't find my pencil and eraser.
sentences.cn: 怎麽啦? 我找不到我的铅笔和橡皮擦.

sentences.en: Yes, I have your eraser, too.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我还拿了你的橡皮.

sentences.en: You can rub out the chalk marks with the eraser.
sentences.cn: 你可以用黑板擦把粉笔印擦掉.

words.tran_cn: 可消除的；可抹去的；可删除的

trans.tran_en: a small piece of rubber that you use to remove pencil or pen marks from paper
a small piece of rubber that you use to remove pencil or pen marks from paper
